phrases: and your host, once again, is me, your neighbor, Kai Harada.
And I have the perfect song here to start off the day.
Here is our first song of the morning.
We usually get good reception when we pass that tower.
Is this your first time in Morioh, sir?
What kind of place is it?
The beef tongue cooked in miso is good.
Sorry, I actually do not know that much about it.
Oh, where was I supposed to drop you off again?
In front of the station is fine.
I just hope nothing annoying happens.
In April of 1999, on my very first day of high school, I met two bizarre men.
I finally start high school today...
I wonder what the people will be like.
Though you do not really have to remember that.
I was so nervous on my first walk to my new school that I...
We just ran into each other,
and the things in my bag flew out...
Sorry I was not watching where I was going.
Do you know of a Higashikata household around here?
If you take the 3 bus, it will get you to Johzenji.
If you wait a little while, it will get here soon.
The first guy was this man, Jotaro Kujo.
I found this out later, but he is 28, and he is a marine explorer.
He is famous in the scientific world for his ecological research.
He seems really wild, but intelligent... or cool, I guess.
My name is Koichi Hirose, and I am a new student.
They are getting on a different bus.
The hell are you doing, you bastard?!
Who do you think you are?
The turtle that lives in this pond woke up from hibernation, so I was watching it.
I do not handle turtles really well.
I am scared to even touch them.
So I was thinking it is about time I got over my fear...
That is not what I asked!
You are pretty tall for a first-year.
But before you have the nerve to dress like that...
Who said you could wear that?
You need to talk to us first!
W-Wait... I am not a fan of reptiles.
What the hell are you smiling at?
There are a lot of guys
I last saw in a hospital after they said they did not know and were sorry.
I will let you off the hook this time.
Take off that jacket and the pants, and leave them here.
That just means if you do not want them after you, do not dress like that.
What pisses me off more is that
he is not even mad after what they did to that turtle.
Why do not you tell me your name?
Josuke, we are going to call you Jojo from now on!
Hurry up and take off that uniform.
If you do not hurry it up, I am going to shave off that Astro Boy hair, too.
Well, what are you waiting for?
What did you just say about my hair?
I will not let anyone get away with making fun of my hair, no matter who it is!
Did you say my hair looked like Sazae-san?
Some kind of Stand just appeared from behind him.
Where you got punched is going back to normal!
But does it look like it healed all weird?
His face looks kind of different.
I had to touch that turtle,
even though I did not want to, thanks to you.
What are you going to do about that, huh?!
Oh, it is just the turtle again.
She was 21 at the time, and was going to college in Tokyo.
You have lived here ever since you were born.
In 1987, when you were four, you came down with a fever due to an unknown because,
and for the next 50 days, no one knew if you would survive or not.
This is such a rotten role to play.
Your father's name is Joseph Joestar.
He is the founder of Joestar Realty.
I have heard of him before.
Apparently he is a huge real estate mogul in the US.
He is still doing all right,
but when I was looking into how to split up his inheritance,
I found out that he had a son in Japan, which would be you.
He did not even know about it himself.
Going on about how he would only ever love his wife,
yet I just found his son who was born when he was 62 years old
as a result of an affair.
I guess I should not have said that.
I guess, technically, I am your nephew.
Let us talk while we walk.
And so, eventually, you are going to get a third of the old man's inheritance.
I came here to tell you that.
The whole Joestar household is in chaos since the old man's affair came to light.
My grandma, Suzie Q, is the angriest she is ever been
I am so sorry I have caused such a fuss!
Well, I mean, causing trouble in a family is no good.
My mother has told me that she was in love when she gave birth to me.
Could you tell, uh, my dad, um...
that he does not have to worry about us?
I came here prepared to take a punch intended for the old man,
and instead, he is actually apologizing?
Let us go to school together.
Your hair looks as cool as ever.
You are so different from the other guys.
I am actually in the middle of something important right now...
If you do not hurry, we are going to be late.
I am not done talking to you yet.
Hey, have your stupid talk about hair later.
He talked shit about his hair!
What were you saying about my hair, huh?!
Josuke hates people insulting his hair more than anything else.
It is just like what happened earlier!
It is the physical manifestation of your psychological energy.
Stands can only be seen by other Stand users.
It pisses me off when someone talks bad about my awesome hair.
You are wide open from your chin down!
It pisses me off when girls freak out!
It seems like they know each other.
But he is kind of hot...
I have no idea what is going on!
Actually, it is been ten years.
But I was able to stop time for half a second.
If I had not stopped time...
I doubt we would have been killed,
but one of us would have been badly injured.
There is actually another reason I came to see you.
The other reason is this picture.
Something is hiding in this town.
When Old Man Joseph tried to get a spirit photo of you,
this is what he got instead.
But he is probably a Stand user.
This does not concern you, but I wanted to at least show you the picture.
If you happen to see him, do not go anywhere near him.
Calling the police will not help.
Do not lose your temper and go after him, either.
You will get hurt, just like a moment ago.
Who knows what my mom'll do to me if I am late on the first day?!
Hey, I will listen to everything you have got to say after school.
The other bizarre guy I happened to meet is Josuke Higashikata.
He unpredictable and can go right from goofy to pissed off.
I guess his family situation is complicated.
So his Stand reforms things into a different shape after they are broken?
If it had been my face or head...
But if I think about him as a potential ally, he should be reliable.
If you overlook his ridiculous personality, anyway.
I just hope this has nothing to do with Josuke.
I will give you a ride.
Hey, do not be so cold!
You will go wherever I want?
I would go anywhere with you.
Then you can go straight to Hell!
then you called my daughter a crazy bitch.
I will let it go this time, but be more careful in the future.
I am done for the day.
Today was his entrance ceremony, right?
He would better not be up to any trouble.
That idiot can seem calm, then get pissed off outta nowhere.
I wonder who he took after.
Deep down, in the bottom of his heart, he is kind.
No need to worry about him.
Why do not we celebrate him starting high school tonight?
But I wonder if he will come home early.
He will probably stop somewhere again.
Hey, I want to stop by Kameyu.
I just bought you an expensive bag the other day.
I want to look at, like, clothes today.
Pay attention to where you are walking, moron.
He is not even going to apologize after running into someone?
You just want to go to Kameyu, right?
He was sent to juvie for robbery and rape when he was just 12.
Since he committed that first crime,
he is become the most awful
and disgusting criminal in Japan's history.
He spent most of his youth in jail for his crimes,
a total of 20 years by the time he would turned 34.
His last crime was so vile, it would make even a rat in the bathroom puke.
He was eventually arrested, and the sentence they gave him
But, somehow, the execution failed to kill him.
He most likely became a Stand user right before his execution.
but he is hiding out in this quiet town...
We are in the same class.
Oh, you want to hear what that Jotaro guy has to say?
It is been bugging me, and it has to do with this town.
I am sort of curious, but when I thought it through,
I do not think getting involved with being some guy's lovechild is a good idea.
Things are just fine as they are right now.
It is dangerous, so step back.
A man robbing that convenience store took a female employee hostage inside.
Th-That lady has rung me up before!
He will totally kill her if he loses it.
All of you, get outta the way!
I am getting into the car!
Hey, you with the stupid hair!
I told you to get away from the car!
You do not care what happens to her?
What are you going to do if he loses it?
I told you guys to stay back, too!
I have made up my mind!
I am going to stab this girl!
Th-There is a hole in his body!
You would better get a surgeon to take that out... in the prison hospital.
What are you doing, opening your mouth?
I would find another Stand user here?
I possessed this man and was having a blast with that robbery, and then...
How dare you get in my way?!
He is the guy from the picture!
I will be watching you from now on.
I will be watching you all the time.
What did you say, you bastard?!
What Mr. Jotaro said was true.
There is something in this town...
I can feel the presence of something completely unknown.
Something bad is here in Morioh.
We did not have a chance to actually talk yesterday.
We need to talk about the guy hiding in this town.
Oh, I actually wanted to talk to you about that.
Mr. Jotaro, where are you right now?
Damn it, this pisses me off.
Where the hell did I put the shovel?
Looks like he is got a cozy little family.
Not to mention he is got himself a hot, young mother...
Josuke Higashikata, do not get cocky, now.
I am going to destroy your livelihood, your soul, and your life.
